name: My Room (DKrazy Productions)
description:
A game I made in 3 days as a personal project. I'm new to Unity, so I thought I'd make something short to test my skills.

Try interacting with everything to get the full experience. Maybe interact with the window last.

Hello.

This is my room. Do you like it?

I think it's nice. Although I wish I could be alone in there for a while. Things I can't quite make out keep appearing in my closet and under the bed.

I don't mind. It's nice to have company every once in a while.

Sometimes I feel them watching me when I sleep. I once felt something place a cold hand on my temple. But I fell asleep eventually.

Have a look around.

Controls:

W - Forward

A - Left

S - Backward

D - Right

E - Interact with objects

ESC - Quit
